mapper.select: SELECT b.*, bm.* FROM bus b JOIN bus_manage bm ON b.bus_idx = bm.bus_idx;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bus (route_name, license_plate, fuel_efficiency, buy_date, bus_company, seat_number, bus_type) VALUES (#{route_name}, #{license_plate}, #{fuel_efficiency}, #{buy_date}, #{bus_company}, #{seat_number}, #{bus_type})

INSERT INTO bus_manage (bus_idx, inspect_date, next_inspect_date, status, distance, emp_idx, content, amount) VALUES (#{bus_idx}, #{inspect_date}, #{next_inspect_date}, #{status}, #{distance}, #{emp_idx}, #{content}, #{amount})
